title: Fake Outrage: Exposed - 5/29/18
description:
Hour 1 
Who is Tommy Robinson?....Right-wing UK activist gone mad?...the UK and the rest of Europe are quite literally backed into a corner…The threat of some of these Islamist groups is very real, and governments aren't doing A THING to address it ...High praise for Trump from low fruit?...The enemy of my enemy is my friend...Candace Owens + Glenn Beck = Free Thinkers ...Is Donald Trump opening up a pizza parlor ...NY Times asks if Trump separated immigrant children from parents and lost them?...stop with the 'fake outrage' ...a Carl Sagan must-read? ...Israeli company claims to be able to charge electric cars in 5 minutes? 

 

Hour 2 
Female serial killers apply within?...Las Vegas teacher threatens to go postal? ...England is on fire...Guns, knives, now Q-tips and balloon sticks? ...'Highest Military Honor' awarded to retired Navy SEAL...Glenn tells the story of black Navy hero Doris 'Dorie' Miller?...fought for his country during a time of racism, marginalization…mess attendant becomes hero ...Come see history with your own eyes...MercuryOne.org/museum2018 

 

Hour 3 
Family TV Watching = Impossible...family television is almost non-existent...so little to watch with your kids…'family shows'...is there nothing in between?...'Leave Me Alone Television'? ...Did you know you can't clip your nails at Starbucks...Pat's solution for the 30 year-old guy living with his parents?...Starbucks prepares to end racism?...reviewing ‘Solo’…Star Wars as a philosophically sound story = more movies…here’s why ‘Rogue One’ was important
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
